content: La strega maledetta ha eseguito una magia malvagia sull'uomo e lo ha trasformato in un insetto.
translations: eng:The wicked witch cast a spell on the man and turned him into a bug
eng:The wicked witch cast an evil spell on the man and turned him into an insect
credits: Sentence from Tatoeba by Guybrush88 (CC-BY 2.0 FR)
